name: Ext_R5_TestReport_testScript
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.TestReport.testScript for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents TestReport.testScript from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/TestReport|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Canonical URL to the  version-specific TestScript that was executed to produce this TestReport
element.definition: Ideally this is an absolute URL that is used to identify the version-specific TestScript that was executed, matching the `TestScript.url`.
element.comment: `TestReport.testScript` maps to R4 `TestReport.testScript`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Canonical URL to the  version-specific TestScript that was executed to produce this TestReport
element.definition: Ideally this is an absolute URL that is used to identify the version-specific TestScript that was executed, matching the `TestScript.url`.
element.comment: `TestReport.testScript` maps to R4 `TestReport.testScript`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
